network

Class GameThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.GameThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A separate thread for managing the individual games taking place on the server
    Version:
    2/16/20
    Author:
    Ryan Cluff, rpcluff, rpcluff@asu.edu

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameThread.InputListener
      A class implementing Runnable that continually listens for user input

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Connect4 game
      The model of the game
      private Player player1
      The first player for this individual game (Will always be human)
      private Player player2
      The second player for this individual game (Can be human or computer)

      • updateClient

        public void updateClient(java.lang.String status,
                         boolean gameOver,
                         int[][] board,
                         boolean turn,
                         Player player)
        Update the client with the supplied information
        Parameters:
        status - Text to be placed at the bottom of the game (indicated turn, win / tie)
        gameOver - Indicates to the player if the game is over or not
        board - A 2d array to be rendered on the clients application
        player - the player which to update
